de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.model.abstracts

Class SemanticRelation<Target>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.model.abstracts.HasFrequencies
      • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.model.abstracts.SemanticRelation<Target>
  • Type Parameters:
    Target - The class targeted by the relation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHasFrequencies, ISemanticRelation<Target>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SenseRelation, SynsetRelation

    public class SemanticRelation<Target>
extends HasFrequencies
implements ISemanticRelation<Target>
    A parent class for UBY-LMF classes that represent a semantic relation.
    Author:
    Zijad Maksuti

      • getSource

        public Target getSource()
        Returns the UBY-LMF class instance representing the source of this SemanticRelation.

        Note that this backlink is not a part of UBY-LMF and is added for convenience reasons.
